sodium.extras.options.clouds.height.desc:
Raises cloud height.
Configure the height of the clouds
sodium.extras.options.culling.entity.des: If enabled, Entities will be hidden based on configured distance limit
sodium.extras.options.culling.entity.dis: Hides and does not tick entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
Hides and does not tick entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
sodium.extras.options.culling.tiles.desc: If enabled, Block Entities will be hidden based on configured distance limit
sodium.extras.options.culling.tile.dista: Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.

Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.mode.desc:
Makes the rest of the world more realistically dark. Does not effect daytime or torch light.
Controls how dark is considered true darkness.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.others.de:
If enabled, true darkness will be applied in other dimensions

[WARNING] This option will be removed in a near future in favor of a blacklist
sodium.extras.options.darkness.overworld: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the Overworld.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.noskyligh: If enabled, true darkness will be applied on dimensions without skylight
sodium.extras.options.darkness.nether.de: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the Nether.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.nether.br: Configure fog brightness in the Nether when darkness is enabled.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.end.title: Enable on End
sodium.extras.options.darkness.end.desc: If enabled, true darkness will be applied in the End.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.end.brigh: Configure fog brightness in the End when darkness is enabled.
sodium.extras.options.darkness.blockligh: If enabled, Disables sky, fog and moon brightness, making blocks as a only source of light
sodium.extras.options.darkness.moonphase: If enabled, Darkness will be affected by Moon Phases
Configure brightness on a new moon, or minimal bright level on black moon phase
Configure brightness on a full moon, or maximum bright level on black moon phase
sodium.extras.options.displayfps.title: Display FPS
sodium.extras.options.displayfps.desc: Displays the current FPS. Advanced mode also displays minimum FPS, as well as 15 second average FPS, useful for judging performance.
sodium.extras.options.displayfps.gravity: Corner position of the FPS display
Displays memory usage and GPU usage beside FPS counter
Add a Shadow box onto FPS Display, at the pure style of F3
sodium.extras.options.dynlights.tiles.de:
If enabled, dynamic lighting will be showed on tile entities (furnaces, modded machines, etc).

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not around furnaces
sodium.extras.options.dynlights.entities:
If enabled, dynamic lighting will be showed on entities (dropped items, mobs, etc).

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not holding a torch.
sodium.extras.options.dynlights.speed.de:
Controls how often dynamic lights will update.

Lighting recalculation can be expensive, so slower values will give better performance.
sodium.extras.options.fadein.title: Chunk Fade In Quality
sodium.extras.options.fadein.desc: Controls how fast chunks fade in. No performance hit, Fancy simply takes longer, but looks a bit cooler. Currently not working
sodium.extras.options.fastchest.title: Use Fast Chests
sodium.extras.options.fastchest.desc:
If enabled, replaces chests model with a static model, like a normal block. Breaks chest animation but goes more faster on chest rooms

Option has no effects with flywheel installed and running batching or instancing backend
sodium.extras.options.fastbeds.title: Use Fast Beds
sodium.extras.options.fastbeds.desc: If enabled, replaces dynamic bed model with a static model, like a normal block. Increases performance and also let you use custom models with resource packs
sodium.extras.options.fog.title: Use Fog
sodium.extras.options.fog.desc: If disabled, removed fog effect only in the overworld
sodium.extras.options.fontshadow.title: Font Shadows
sodium.extras.options.fontshadow.desc:
If disabled, text will stop rendering shadows giving a flat style.
Increases FPS depending of how much text is on the screen, specially with BetterF3 mods
sodium.extras.options.jei.title: Hide JEI Until Searching
sodium.extras.options.jei.desc: If enabled, JEI item list will be hidden unless you search for something. Press space to search for everything.
sodium.extras.options.screen.title: Fullscreen Mode
sodium.extras.options.screen.desc:
Windowed - the game will display in a small window.
Borderless - the game will be fullscreened, and locked to your monitor's refresh rate, but allow you to tab out easily.
Fullscreen - the game will display in native fullscreen mode.
sodium.extras.options.zoom.cinematic.des:
Enable Cinematic Camera while zooming.
If you disable this, you should also try setting `zoomSmoothnessMs` to `0`
sodium.extras.options.zoom.sensitive.des:
Mouse Sensitivity will not be reduced below this amount while zoomed in.
Set to `1.0` to prevent it from being changed at all (not recommended without `enableCinematicZoom`)
sodium.extras.options.zoom.speed.title: Zoom Speed
sodium.extras.options.zoom.speed.desc: Speed for Zoom In/Out key binds & zoom scrolling (if enabled).
sodium.extras.options.zoom.scrolling.des:
Allows you to zoom in and out by scrolling up and down on your mouse while zoom is active.
This will prevent you from scrolling through your hotbar while zooming if enabled.
sodium.extras.options.zoom.smoothness.de:
FOV changes will be spread out over this many milliseconds.
Set to `0` to disable animations.
sodium.extras.options.zoom.easing.title: Easing Exponent
sodium.extras.options.zoom.easing.desc:
Smoothing animation progress will be raised to this exponent for easing. Higher numbers will feel faster.
It is recommended to also increase `zoomSmoothnessMs` when increasing this.
Set to `1` to disable.
sodium.extras.options.zoom.quadratics.de:
Zoom percentage will be squared before being applied if `true`.
Makes differences in FOV more uniform. You should probably keep this on if you don't understand what it does.
sodium.extras.options.zoom.default.title: Default Zoom
sodium.extras.options.zoom.toggle.title: Toggle Mode
sodium.extras.options.zoom.toggle.desc: If `true`, the Zoom keybind will act as a toggle. If `false`, Zoom will only be active while the keybind is held.
sodium.extras.options.zoom.max.title: Maximum FOV
sodium.extras.options.zoom.min.title: Minimum FOV
Configures how Borderless Fullscreen should be attached

ATTACH - Adds it between windowed and Fullscreen
REPLACE - Replaced Fullscreen with Borderless Fullscreen
OFF - Disables Borderless Fullscreen attachment to F11 key
sodium.extras.options.others.languagescr: If enabled, Language updates only reload language instead of all resources, a 99.9% extra of speed
